title: Mini Series - State v. John Brookins – Addendum 1 – Making An Exoneree
description:
September 24, 2020 / Host Rebecca Lavoie talks with Colin Miller, Marc Howard, and Marty Tankleff about the work by Georgetown's Prisons and Justice Initiative on the John Brookins case.

Episode scoring music by Animal Weapon and Blue Dot Sessions.
